title: Kannousei Play Things
description: Bartender Yura who works at a BDSM club likes to tempt arrogant men that looks down on him, he met Chihiro that just happens to be his type. Curious sexual questions between the two led them to spend the night together, and it seems both are after something and making use of one another. Chihiro that lasts long in bed have found Yura as an enthralling toy while Yura have found the perfect arrogant guy that he’d enjoy to play with.
